text: @marcorubio Not very Presidential. Coronavirus has Trump worried about CRASHING MARKETS, NOT DISEASE. Trump’s tweet made clear his real concern about coronavirus. “Low Ratings Fake News are doing everything possible to make the Caronavirus look asbad as possible,”including panicking markets"
